item.title: 据称印尼Merdeka Gold公司已聘请银行为其香港上市提供服务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印尼矿业公司PT Merdeka Gold Resources已聘请投资银行筹备其在香港上市事宜，此举正值金价攀升至新高之际。【原文：Indonesian miner PT Merdeka Gold Resources has hired investment banks to work on its listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, as gold prices are scaling fresh heights.】

item.title: 李飞飞的人工智能初创公司World Labs正以50亿美元估值进行融资谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，人工智能先驱李飞飞已与投资者展开磋商，计划为其初创公司World Labs筹集数亿美元资金，公司估值约为50亿美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence pioneer Fei-Fei Li has had discussions with investors to raise hundreds of millions in funding for her startup, World Labs, at a valuation of about $5 billion, according to people familiar with the discussion.】

item.title: 日本高市早苗将解散国会，展开最短竞选周期
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗将于周五解散众议院，并宣布于2月8日举行提前选举。此举旨在巩固其在众议院中微弱的多数优势，并进一步强化执政基础。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is set to dissolve the lower chamber of parliament on Friday and call a snap election for Feb. 8, in an attempt to give a boost to the razor-thin majority she currently holds in the lower house and consolidate power.】

item.title: 美国呼吁数据中心在风暴来临前准备备用电源
item.description: 美国政府要求全国电网运营商从包括数据中心在内的设施中调配备用电力，以应对这场创纪录的冬季风暴可能引发的全国性停电。【原文：The US government asked the nation’s grid operators to make backup power available from facilities including data centers as a record-breaking winter storm threatens blackouts across the country.】

item.title: 前花旗银行家为新印度公司筹集20亿美元
item.description: 花旗集团前私人银行家在印度创立的新投资公司已吸引近20亿美元资产，他瞄准的是一个不断增长的财富市场，并认为该市场十年内至少可达10万亿美元规模。【原文：A former private banker at Citigroup Inc. has attracted almost $2 billion in assets for his new investment firm in India by tapping a growing wealth market that he thinks could be worth at least $10 trillion in a decade.】

item.title: 斯凯根基金押注内存芯片，投资标的从阿里巴巴转向三星
item.description: 挪威斯凯根资产管理公司旗下的一只表现优异的基金正押注亚洲两大热门人工智能概念股——三星电子和阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司——将走向截然不同的命运。【原文：A top-performing Norway-based Skagen AS fund is betting on diverging fortunes for two of Asia’s hottest artificial intelligence trades: Samsung Electronics Co. and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.】

item.title: 瑞银资产管理公司预测人民币将占全球储备货币10%份额
item.description: 瑞银资产管理公司表示，随着投资者对美国政策的担忧加剧，若投资者增加投资组合多元化，中国将从中受益。【原文：China stands to benefit if investors increase portfolio diversification amid escalating concerns over US policies, according to UBS Asset Management.】

item.title: 新加坡房价涨幅低于预期，租金下跌
item.description: 2025年新加坡房价上涨3.3%，略低于最初预估，因年末市场显现降温迹象。【原文：Singapore home prices rose 3.3% in 2025, slightly less than initially estimated, as the market showed signs of cooling toward the end of the year.】

item.title: 经过多年波折，TikTok最终敲定美国运营协议
item.description: TikTok及其中国母公司字节跳动有限公司已完成一项备受期待的交易，将部分美国业务转让给美国投资者，从而确保了这款热门视频应用在美国市场的未来，并避免了全美范围的禁令。【原文：TikTok and its Chinese parent ByteDance Ltd. have closed a long-awaited deal to transfer parts of its US operations to American investors, securing the popular video app’s future in the US and avoiding a nationwide ban.】

item.title: 理想汽车空头头寸攀升至历史新高，电动汽车竞争加剧
item.description: 在去年成为亚洲最赚钱的空头交易之一后，理想汽车的空头押注正飙升至历史高位，该公司正努力在高端SUV市场抵御竞争对手的冲击。【原文：After earning a reputation as one of Asia’s most profitable short trades last year, Li Auto Inc.’s bearish bets are jumping to record levels as the company struggles to fend off rivals in the premium SUV market.】

item.title: 新加坡开始拨款39亿美元提振本土股市
item.description: 新加坡已开始向选定的基金经理分配其计划投资于本地股票的50亿新元（39亿美元）资金的一部分，旨在巩固股市复苏势头。【原文：Singapore has started handing out part of the S$5 billion ($3.9 billion) it plans to invest in local stocks to selected fund managers, in a bid to cement an equity market revival.】

item.title: 新加坡政府投资公司第三方代理商在韩国做空案中缴纳罚款，新加坡海峡时报报道
item.description: 据《海峡时报》援引韩国监管机构文件报道，新加坡主权财富基金的第三方代理机构因所谓"裸卖空"行为被处以1.206亿韩元（约合82,328美元）罚款。【原文：A third-party agent of Singapore’s sovereign wealth fund has paid a 120.6 million won ($82,328) fine for so-called naked short selling, the Straits Times reported, citing documents by South Korean regulators.】

item.title: 高收入群体在里夫斯预算案后情绪更趋悲观，GfK调查显示
item.description: 自财政大臣瑞秋·里夫斯公布预算案以来，英国民众对自身财务前景的信心有所提升——唯独高收入群体除外。【原文：Britons are feeling brighter about their financial prospects since Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves unveiled her budget — all except for the highest-paid.】

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特走强挤压出口依赖型手套制造商
item.description: 马来西亚作为全球领先的乳胶手套生产国，正面临利润率收紧的困境。该国货币走强侵蚀了以美元计价的收益，凸显了该国出口商面临的挑战。【原文：Malaysia’s world-leading producers of latex gloves are facing tightened profit margins as the nation’s strong currency bites into dollar-denominated earnings, underscoring challenges of the nation’s exporters.】

item.title: 谷歌就应用商店达成反垄断协议，却遭遇法官质疑
item.description: 谷歌与Epic Games公司就其移动应用商店运营方式达成的反垄断和解协议，遭到联邦法官的强烈质疑。这位法官多次质问该协议是否为两家公司量身定制的"特殊交易"，而牺牲了更广泛市场的利益。【原文：Google’s proposed settlement with Epic Games Inc. in a long-running antitrust dispute over how the tech giant operates its mobile app store drew deep skepticism from a federal judge, who repeatedly questioned if it was a “sweetheart deal” for the two companies at the expense of the broader market.】

item.title: 拥有杀手级应用的中国人工智能股票正赢得投资者青睐
item.description: 随着中国本土人工智能热潮进入第二年，投资者正蜂拥买入拥有杀手级应用的公司股票，以追逐能支撑估值飙升的盈利。【原文：As China’s homegrown artificial intelligence boom enters its second year, investors are piling into shares of companies with killer apps in a hunt for earnings that justify surging valuations.】

item.title: 日本通胀因补贴效应放缓，日本央行决议前夕
item.description: 日本通胀率受政府补贴影响，时隔四个月首次放缓。这份报告在央行政策决议前几小时发布，却凸显了价格压力的潜在强度。【原文：Japan’s inflation slowed for the first time in four months on the impact of government subsidies, in a report that nevertheless highlighted the underlying strength of price pressure hours before the central bank decides policy.】

item.title: 油价持稳，因美元疲软与风险偏好情绪抵消供应过剩担忧
item.description: 油价持稳，因更广泛市场风险偏好情绪升温及美元走软，抵消了对美国及其他地区供应增加的担忧。【原文：Oil steadied as a risk-on mood in wider markets and a weaker dollar offset concerns about higher supplies in the US and elsewhere.】

item.title: 美国高评级公司债券利差触及三十年来新低
item.description: 周四，一项关键的信贷风险指标降至1990年代末以来的最低水平，此前地缘政治紧张局势有所缓和，对全球经济放缓的担忧也减轻了。【原文：A key measure of credit risk reached the lowest level since the late 1990s on Thursday, after geopolitical tensions cooled and fears of a global economic slowdown abated.】

item.title: 闪迪空头面临"极端"挤压风险，亏损达30亿美元
item.description: 据S3 Partners LLC数据显示，在闪迪公司股价大幅上涨的同时，其空头头寸已持续数月攀升，将空头回补风险推升至"极端"水平。【原文：Short interest in Sandisk Corp. has been climbing for months alongside a sharp rally in the stock, pushing the risk of a short squeeze to an “extreme” level, according to S3 Partners LLC.】

item.title: 金价逼近5000美元关口，美元走软助推涨势
item.description: 金价升至每盎司近5000美元的历史高位，因地缘政治风险及美联储独立性面临的威胁，为这场由货币和债券市场撤资推动的涨势提供了额外支撑。【原文：Gold rose to a record high near $5,000 an ounce, as geopolitical risk and threats to the Federal Reserve’s independence added support to a rally fueled by a retreat from currencies and bonds.】

item.title: 《南华早报》称中国将设定更低增长目标以应对经济放缓
item.description: 据《南华早报》报道，中国将把2026年的经济增长目标区间设定得低于去年，这反映出经济活动将持续放缓的迹象日益明显。【原文：China will set a lower economic growth target range for 2026 than last year, the South China Morning Post reported, reflecting mounting signs that activity will continue to slow.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税确实会咬人——当他真的实施时
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普征收的关税比至少一个世纪以来的任何美国总统都多——但仅占他威胁征收关税的一小部分。【原文：Donald Trump has imposed more tariffs than any American president in at least a century – but only a fraction of the ones he’s threatened.】

item.title: 部分新世界债券飙升逾200%，开发商寻求稳定
item.description: 新世界发展有限公司近期债券价格的上涨，使其过去一年的涨幅进一步扩大，部分证券已摆脱困境状态。随着该公司继续努力增强流动性，其四只债券的价格涨幅已超过三倍。【原文：New World Development Co.’s recent bond rally has added to gains over the past year that have lifted some of its securities out of distressed territory, while the price of four of its notes have more than tripled as the builder works to further shore up its liquidity.】

item.title: 活动人士称日本创始家族未能提振股价
item.description: 一位驻伦敦的激进投资者向两家主要由创始家族持股的日本公司董事发出一系列信函，指责他们应对股价处于"极度低迷"水平负责。【原文：A London-based activist investor has fired off a series of letters to the directors of two Japanese companies largely owned by their founding families saying they are responsible for share prices at “extremely depressed” levels.】

item.title: 苹果称欧盟正利用"政治拖延战术"对应用变更施加罚款
item.description: 苹果公司指责欧盟委员会利用"政治拖延战术"推迟实施新的应用程序政策，以此为借口对这家iPhone制造商展开调查并处以罚款。【原文：Apple Inc. accused the European Commission of using “political delay tactics” to postpone new app policies as a pretense to investigate and fine the iPhone maker.】

item.title: 亚洲股市料将上涨，美国数据及日本央行成焦点：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周五有望跟随华尔街走高，因乐观的美国经济数据、科技股的强劲上涨以及地缘政治紧张局势的缓解提振了投资者情绪。【原文：Asian equities looked set to follow Wall Street higher Friday, as upbeat US economic data, a surge in tech stocks, and easing geopolitical tensions buoyed investor sentiment.】

item.title: 亚马逊准备裁撤数千名企业员工
item.description: 亚马逊公司正准备裁减数千名企业员工，以加大精简官僚机构的力度。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is gearing up to ax thousands more corporate employees, ratcheting up efforts to streamline bureaucracy.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空业绩超预期后对2026年前景持谨慎态度
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团凭借高端及商务旅行的强劲需求，超出华尔街对今年最后几个月的预期，但该公司与大型竞争对手一样，对2026年的前景持更为谨慎的态度。【原文：Alaska Air Group Inc. seized on strong demand for premium and business travel to beat Wall Street’s expectations for the final months of the year, though it joined larger rivals in offering a more tepid outlook for 2026.】

item.title: 支撑人工智能热潮的循环交易指南
item.description:
若人工智能未能发挥其潜力，相互关联的投资网络将加剧损失的连锁反应风险。

【原文：

A web of interlinked investments raises the risk of cascading losses if AI falls short of its potential.

】
